H0.text: The first issue of which British children’s comic was published in April 1950. Lion

H1.text: The first issue of which British children’s comic was published in April 1950. Tiger

H2.text: The first issue of which British children’s comic was published in April 1950. Valiant

H3.text: The first issue of which British children’s comic was published in April 1950. Eagle

A4.text: Lion was a weekly British comics periodical published by Amalgamated Press (and later Fleetway Publications and IPC Magazines) from 23 February 1952 to 18 May 1974.

A5.text: Lion (Amalgamated Press, 1952 Series) at the Grand Comics Database

A6.text: Lion and Eagle (IPC, 1969 Series) at the Grand Comics Database

A7.text: Tiger was a weekly British comics periodical published by Amalgamated Press, Fleetway Publications and IPC Magazines from 11 September 1954 to 30 March 1985.

A9.text: Valiant (1962-1963) at the Grand Comics Database

A10.text: the first issue of Eagle was released on 14 April 1950
